entry.title: FROST ADVISORY, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:13 a.m. EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1 with frost.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Low minus 1 with frost. Forecast issued 2:35 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 15 except 6 near the lake.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 15 except 6 near the lake. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 2:35 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 2:35 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
